text:
Intro
   I'm writing a visual editor for log4j configuration, so I'm wokring closely
to low level configuration API, I found that constants for prefixes in this
class are not public, this forces me to duplicate unnecesarly.

   I have not chequed the DOMConfigurator, but a similar situation may happen.

Making this constants more visible makes the component more accessible from the
outside, I currently have not found another way (except duplicating code) for
obtaining this data.
creator: m_griffa@yahoo.com

text:
Just looking at the prefixes, some of them end with . some not.  To make these
consistent, it seems likely you'd be able to make use of them.

Since there's only 12 to duplicate, I don't see the big deal.  I agree this is
sub-optimal.  Perhaps you can come up with a reasonable patch?

I'd also suggest you stick with the XML configuration file format.
creator: genman@noderunner.net
